description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Watch over 200 beautiful landscapes, featuring 15 different transitions and 9 special effects. Keep track of time with the handy clock feature. The perfect relaxing visual treat whilst listening to music!
